name: High Lord of Angst
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves" "257962" #L "Lord of Angst" "244821" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves + Lord of Angst = #L "High Lord of Angst" "257128"
